rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Port Plenty enters the battlefield, create
a 4/4 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{T}: Target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.
